# The `less_second` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> object to check whether the second component of a container supported by std::get (like std::pair and std::tuple) compares less than the second component of another container. <a href="#details">More...</a>
